Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Enemy
    Enemy is the interface to combine functionality and variables that all Enemies of the Player have in common
    GameEvent
    GameEvent is the interface to collect logic that can be called for all types of events
    Item
    Item is the interface to collect data and functionality that is common between all Item subclasses
    Runner
    Runner is the interface to store logic for any task
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionChoiceListener
    ActionChoiceLister is the ActionListener class that will be used to handle when the user clicks an action button (to run the action).
    Animal
    Animal is the abstract class that extends Creature and is used for collecting logic and instance variables that will be shared among all Animal subclasses.
    Control
    Control is the class to represent one functionality that the user can enact
    CONTROLLER
    Controller is the fully-static class to aggregate all of the global values which need to be passed back and forth between other classes
    ControlListener
    ControlListener is the ActionListener class that waits for the activation of a control button on the interface and executes that Control's logic when activated.
    Controls
    Controls is the class to aggregate Control Objects into a manageable menu
    ConversationEvent
    ConversationEvent is the GameEvent class that stores logic to run conversations between the player and other Creatures
    ConversationNode
    ConversationNode is the class to keep track of individual pieces of a ConversationEvent (being one back-and-forth) between a Creature and a Player
    Creature
    Creature is the class to collect logic and variables that will be shared by all Creature subclasses
    CreatureChoiceListener
    CreatureChoiceListener is the class to be activated when a Creature button is pressed on the GUI
    data_creatures
    data_creatures is the class to keep track of the creatures that are a part of this Game
    data_events
    data_events is the class to keep track of the GameEvents that occur in the Game
    data_locations
    data_locations is the class to store the locations that will be referenced in the Game
    data_names
    data_names is the class to store data for getting random names, downloaded from a name generator
    data_names.Name
    Name is a subclass that allows the connection of a first name with a last name
    FightEvent
    FightEvent is the class for GameEvents that involve fights with other Creatures
    FoodItem
    FoodItem is the class to represent an Item that can be eaten
    Game
    Game is the class to store information about a NightAtTheZoo Game
    GameControlButton
    GameControlButton is the JButton class that adds the styling and actions for the NightAtTheZoo Game
    GameInterface
    GameInterface is the class to manage the interface of a NightAtTheZoo game
    HelpControl
    HelpControl is the Control class to manage the Control for the help functionality
    Hippo
    Hippo is the Creature class to represent a hippo enemy
    InteractionEvent
    InteractionEvent is the class to represent actions that a Player can complete
    Location  
    LocationChoiceListener
    LocationChoiceListener is the ActionListener to wait for the player to choose a Location to go to
    LocationList
    LocationList is an ArrayList that specifically applies to Locations and can have Locations be referenced by name
    Menu
    Menu is the main class of this program
    Person
    Person is a Creature that represents a person
    Player
    Player is the class to store unique information about a user
    PRINTER
    PRINTER is the fully static Class that is used to interface between GUIs and the code.
    Response
    Response is the class to represent a possible response to a conversation statement
